extensionDescription.message: Verweise mit GSConnect direkt an den Browser oder per SMS freigeben.

contextMenuMultipleDevices.description: Top-level Context Menu label when multiple devices are available

contextMenuSinglePlugin.description: Context Menu label for devices that only support a single plugin

popupMenuDisconnected.description: Popup Menu label when disconnected from the GNOME Shell extension

popupMenuNoDevices.description: Popup Menu label when no devices are connected or have supported plugins enabled

shareMessage.description: Context Menu label for opening a link in the device's web browser

smsMessage.description: Context Menu label for sharing a link in an SMS message
